mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM t_listen_notes t WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG='1' AND t.LISTENER_ID=#{listenerId}

SELECT t.ID id, t.LISTENER_ID listenerId, t.SCHOOL_ID schoolId, (SELECT b.SCHOOL_NAME FROM t_sys_school b where b.ID=t.SCHOOL_ID) schoolName, t.CLASS_NAME className, t.TEACHER_NAME teacherName, t.DISCIPLINE_ID disciplineId, (SELECT b.PARAM_NAME FROM t_sys_parameter b where b.ID=t.DISCIPLINE_ID) disciplineName, t.SHARE_FLAGE shareFlag, t.COMMENTS comments, t.PICTURE_PATH picturePath, t.SCORE_ID scoreId, (SELECT b.PARAM_NAME FROM t_sys_parameter b where b.ID=t.SCORE_ID) scoreName, t.LISTENER_PATH listenPath, t.CREATE_USER_ID createUserId, t.CREATE_DATA createDate, t.UPDATE_USER_ID updateUserId, t.UPDATE_DATA updateDate FROM t_listen_notes t WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG='1' AND t.LISTENER_ID=#{listenerId}
ORDER BY t.CREATE_DATA
